Module Documentation¶

meta_predict_disorder.py¶

Backend of the IDR machine learning predictor. Based partly on code from Dan Griffith’s IDP-Parrot from the Holehouse lab (specifically the test_unlabeled_data function in train_network.py).

meta_graph.py¶

Backend for graphing predicted disorder values in meta.py.

brnn_architecture.py¶

Code from Dan Griffith’s IDP-Parrot tool from the Holehouse Lab. All credit for this code should go to Dan. See https://idptools-parrot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api.html#module-parrot.encode_sequence for more information.

encode_sequence.py¶

Code from Dan Griffith’s IDP-Parrot tool from the Holehouse Lab. All credit for this code should go to Dan. See https://idptools-parrot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api.html#module-parrot.encode_sequence for more information.
